mil5.5.9:3.1_0: Puna ca bhagavā parisāya dhammaṁ desento kathento anupubbikathaṁ paṭhamaṁ tāva dānakathaṁ katheti, pacchā sīlakathaṁ,
mil5.5.9:3.1_1: tassa bhagavato sabbalokissarassa bhāsitaṁ sutvā devamanussā abhisaṅkharitvā dānaṁ denti,
mil5.5.9:3.1_2: tassa taṁ uyyojitaṁ dānaṁ sāvakā paribhuñjanti.
mil5.5.9:3.3_1: tena hi ‘bhagavā dānakathaṁ paṭhamaṁ kathetī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.5.9:3.4_1: tena hi ‘gāthābhigītaṁ me abhojaneyyan’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.9:3.6_2: tassa te dhammakathaṁ sutvā pasannacittā aparāparaṁ dānaṁ denti, ye taṁ dānaṁ paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:3.7_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho nipuṇo gambhīro tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.9:4.3_3: tañca pana kiriyaṁ sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ paṭhamaṁ dānakathāya,
mil5.5.9:4.3_4: tattha cittaṁ abhiramāpetvā pacchā sīle niyojenti.
mil5.5.9:4.4_1: manussā taruṇadārakānaṁ paṭhamaṁ tāva kīḷābhaṇḍakāni denti.
mil5.5.9:4.6_0: vaṅkakaṁ ghaṭikaṁ ciṅgulakaṁ pattāḷhakaṁ rathakaṁ dhanukaṁ,
mil5.5.9:4.6_1: pacchā te sake sake kamme niyojenti.
mil5.5.9:4.7_1: tathāgato paṭhamaṁ dānakathāya cittaṁ abhiramāpetvā pacchā sīle niyojeti.
mil5.5.9:5.1_1: bhisakko nāma āturānaṁ paṭhamaṁ tāva catūhapañcāhaṁ telaṁ pāyeti balakaraṇāya sinehanāya, pacchā vireceti;
mil5.5.9:5.2_1: tathāgato paṭhamaṁ tāva dānakathāya cittaṁ abhiramāpetvā pacchā sīle niyojeti.
mil5.5.9:5.3_1: dānapatīnaṁ cittaṁ mudukaṁ hoti maddavaṁ siniddhaṁ,
mil5.5.9:6.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘viññattin’ti yaṁ vadesi, kati pana tā viññattiyo”ti?
mil5.5.9:6.3_0: Tattha atthi kāyaviññatti sāvajjā, atthi anavajjā.
mil5.5.9:7.2_0: Idhekacco bhikkhu kulāni upagantvā anokāse ṭhito ṭhānaṁ bhañjati, ayaṁ kāyaviññatti sāvajjā.
mil5.5.9:7.3_0: Tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:7.3_1: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:8.1_1: idhekacco bhikkhu kulāni upagantvā anokāse ṭhito galaṁ paṇāmetvā morapekkhitaṁ pekkhati ‘evaṁ ime passantī’ti, tena ca te passanti, ayampi kāyaviññatti sāvajjā,
mil5.5.9:8.1_2: tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:8.1_3: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:9.1_1: idhekacco bhikkhu hanukāya vā bhamukāya vā aṅguṭṭhena vā viññāpeti, ayampi kāyaviññatti sāvajjā,
mil5.5.9:9.1_2: tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:9.1_3: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:10.2_0: Idha bhikkhu kulāni upagantvā sato samāhito sampajāno ṭhānepi aṭṭhānepi yathānusiṭṭhiṁ gantvā ṭhāne tiṭṭhati, dātukāmesu tiṭṭhati, adātukāmesu pakkamati.
mil5.5.9:10.3_2: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye vaṇṇito hoti thuto pasattho sallekhitācāro,
mil5.5.9:12.2_1: bhikkhu vācāya bahuvidhaṁ viññāpeti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ, ayaṁ vacīviññatti sāvajjā,
mil5.5.9:12.2_2: tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:12.2_3: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:13.1_1: idhekacco bhikkhu paresaṁ sāvento evaṁ bhaṇati ‘iminā me attho’ti,
mil5.5.9:13.1_2: tāya ca vācāya paresaṁ sāvitāya tassa lābho uppajjati, ayampi vacīviññatti sāvajjā,
mil5.5.9:13.1_3: tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:13.1_4: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:14.1_1: idhekacco bhikkhu vacīvipphārena parisāya sāveti ‘evañca evañca bhikkhūnaṁ dātabban’ti,
mil5.5.9:14.1_2: tañca te vacanaṁ sutvā parikittitaṁ abhiharanti, ayampi vacīviññatti sāvajjā,
mil5.5.9:14.1_3: tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti,
mil5.5.9:14.1_4: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:15.1_1: theropi sāriputto atthaṅgate sūriye rattibhāge gilāno samāno therena mahāmoggallānena bhesajjaṁ pucchīyamāno vācaṁ bhindi,
mil5.5.9:15.2_0: Atha thero sāriputto ‘vacībhedena me imaṁ bhesajjaṁ uppannaṁ,
mil5.5.9:15.2_1: mā me ājīvo bhijjī’ti ājīvabhedabhayā taṁ bhesajjaṁ pajahi na upajīvi.
mil5.5.9:15.3_1: tāya ca viññāpitaṁ ariyā na paribhuñjanti.
mil5.5.9:15.4_0: So ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye oññāto hoti hīḷito khīḷito garahito paribhūto acittīkato,
mil5.5.9:16.2_1: bhikkhu sati paccaye bhesajjaṁ viññāpeti ñātipavāritesu kulesu, ayaṁ vacīviññatti anavajjā,
mil5.5.9:16.2_3: so ca puggalo ariyānaṁ samaye vaṇṇito hoti thomito pasattho,
mil5.5.9:17.1_3: tasmā tathāgato taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭikkhipi na upajīvī”ti.
mil5.5.9:18.1_1: tathāgate bhuñjamāne devatā dibbaṁ ojaṁ patte ākiranti,
mil5.5.9:18.1_2: udāhu ‘sūkaramaddave ca madhupāyāse cā’ti dvīsuyeva piṇḍapātesu ākiriṁsū”ti?
mil5.5.9:18.2_1: tathāgate bhuñjamāne devatā dibbaṁ ojaṁ gahetvā upatiṭṭhitvā uddhaṭuddhaṭe ālope ākiranti.
mil5.5.9:19.1_1: rañño sūdo rañño bhuñjantassa sūpaṁ gahetvā upatiṭṭhitvā kabaḷe kabaḷe sūpaṁ ākirati;
mil5.5.9:19.2_1: sabbakālaṁ tathāgate bhuñjamāne devatā dibbaṁ ojaṁ gahetvā upatiṭṭhitvā uddhaṭuddhaṭe ālope dibbaṁ ojaṁ ākiranti.
mil5.5.9:19.3_1: tathāgatassa sukkhayavapulake bhuñjamānassa devatā dibbena ojena temayitvā temayitvā upasaṁhariṁsu,
mil5.5.9:19.4_1: yā tathāgatassa sarīrappaṭijaggane satataṁ samitaṁ ussukkamāpannā.
